```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(forcats)
library(tidyr)

```

```{r}
volcano <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-05-12/volcano.csv')

indonesia_volcanoes1 <- volcano %>% 
  filter(country == "Indonesia") 

#select few columns for bar plot, remove plural types and rename type column
indonesia_volcanoes1_barplot <- indonesia_volcanoes1 %>% 
  select(subregion, primary_volcano_type) %>% 
  mutate(primary_volcano_type = str_remove(primary_volcano_type, "\\(.*\\)")) %>% 
  rename('Volcano Type' = primary_volcano_type) 
 

plot <- indonesia_volcanoes1_barplot %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = subregion)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = primary_volcano_type))
                                           
ggplotly(plot)  

```
